page.title: 05Finchingfield Post Office.
page.content: The post office is used for pensions, family allowance,sweets,stamps,jobs sometimes,toys,cards,food,envelopes, pads and stationery,glue,pens and pencils,batteries,video tapes, sometimes drinks,garden tools,plants, soil,books,paper,matches ,cigarettes. The post office is like a bank and a general store its very important.Most people use the post office sometime in the week and there is a notice board outside the post office.We have a sorting room six metres square and we have got 8 bikes and a spare one. There are 4 postmen who deliver to Finchingfield and Cornish Hall End. Also the mail is sorted for Bardfied and Wetherfield post offices.
